mapper.insert: insert into estimate_main (main_id, main_name, create_date, create_user, `status`) values (#{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select main_id, main_name, create_date, create_user, `status` from estimate_main
